transportAdvice: The historic core of Melaka is compact and very walkable, with most major attractions concentrated in the UNESCO-listed heritage zone. Taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available for longer distances, and the city has limited local bus coverage, though most tourists rely on walking or trishaws within the old town.

weather.description: Warm and humid with occasional afternoon showers, generally manageable for sightseeing.
